name: claude-toolbox
description: Official Claude Code toolbox from Kanopi Studios for Content Management System (CMS) development

plugins.name: cms-cultivator
plugins.description: Comprehensive workflow commands for Drupal and WordPress development

plugins.name: claude-dev-insights
plugins.description: Comprehensive developer analytics and productivity insights for Claude Code. Automatically tracks session analytics, enforces security policies, guards against cost overruns, and ensures code quality with 4 intelligent hooks: SessionEnd, SessionStart, PreToolUse, and PostToolUse.
